b5cadd26-83dc-4dad-87f4-c0c6b3528913.description: Earners of the ESL Core Advanced Certificate are students with advanced knowledge of English which will prepare them for academic coursework and workforce success and increased civic participation.
b5cadd26-83dc-4dad-87f4-c0c6b3528913.name: ESL Core Advanced

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, Take TWO (2) courses from Advanced Low;  Advanced High;  Academic Intermediate A; or Academic Intermediate B.

6a29c3a1-caeb-4794-b284-e7fe85850285.description: Earners of the ESL Core Intermediate Certificate are students with knowledge of intermediate-level reading and writing strategies in English to communicate in many situations and in many places. Students will have the necessary language skills to prepare to take advanced-level ESL classes. And students will be prepared to enroll in other higher-level courses and programs as well as be able to have a meaningful discussion in civics and at the workplace.
6a29c3a1-caeb-4794-b284-e7fe85850285.name: ESL Core Intermediate

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, Take TWO (2) courses: Choose one from Intermediate Low or Academic Beginning A, and Choose one from InterHigh; Academic Intermediate A; or Academic Intermediate B.

ddf1ca84-d347-42a0-a71b-d6bf92d7a5c6.description: Earners of the ESL Core Beginning Certificate are students with knowledge of basic reading and writing strategies in English to communicate in various situations and at different places. Students will have the necessary English language skills to prepare to take intermediate level, ESL classes.
ddf1ca84-d347-42a0-a71b-d6bf92d7a5c6.name: ESL Core Beginning

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take THREE (3) courses: Literacy; Beginning Low; and Beginning High

b9421c1a-2d0e-4356-841f-37135043eb8f.description: The Nursing Assistant Certificate is designed to provide students with the clinical and theoretical knowledge to prepare for the Certified Nursing Assistant (CNA) designation. Students will learn to be part of a healthcare team under the supervision of a nurse. The curriculum is based on the professional standards established by regulatory agencies, and it covers essential topics included in the Nurse Assistant Certification Exam
b9421c1a-2d0e-4356-841f-37135043eb8f.name: Nursing Assistant

alignments.name: California Community Colleges State Chancellor's Office, California Department of Public Health

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take THREE (3) courses.
VHLTH-101 Overview of the Nursing Assistant Training Program
VHLTH-102 Certified Nursing Assistant (CNA) Training
VBUS-400 Employability
or ESL-520 VESL:English for Work 2

5daaa2b3-7703-4de5-9c1e-dca94add6e75.description: This series of courses will provide students with the skills to move towards employment as an apprentice in various areas which may include: General and commercial contracting and/or property maintenance. In addition to getting hands-on instruction in construction, students will receive classroom instruction in math, Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) safety standards, and employability skills.
5daaa2b3-7703-4de5-9c1e-dca94add6e75.name: Vocational Construction Technology

alignments.name: California Community Colleges State Chancellor's Office, North America's Building Trade Union MC3.

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take THREE (3) courses: Vocational Construction Technology Module I; Vocational Construction Technology Module II, and Employability

5c008321-4e11-4122-adc8-1548a3e8099b.description: Earners of the ESL Core Literacy Certificate are students with a literacy level of English skills and abilities to survive in everyday situations and at different places. Students will have fundamental literacy skills to prepare to take the beginning level, ESL classes.
5c008321-4e11-4122-adc8-1548a3e8099b.name: ESL Core Literacy

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, Take TWO (2) courses: Literacy; and choose one course from Spanish Literacy for Adults; Beginning Spanish Literacy; Intermediate Spanish Literacy; or Advanced Spanish Literacy.

5117da85-22bb-4fcb-ba01-ed7958f9c50b.description: The program prepares students for a certification exam and frontline work in the field of applied behavior analysis. The entry-level program is designed to meet training national requirements for certification as a behavior technician. Those who complete the program will learn the skills required to sit for any of the 3 nationally accredited behavior technician exams: Applied Behavior Analysis Technician (ABAT), Board Certified Autism Technician (BCAT), and Registered Behavior Technician (RBT)
5117da85-22bb-4fcb-ba01-ed7958f9c50b.name: Certificate of Completion Behavior Technician

badge_template_activities.title: Take Courses: VMED-080 Introduction to the Behavior Technician Program and VMED-081 Behavior Technician Certification

20cef006-5767-45a6-80d8-fbbdea7a79ac.description: General office clerks perform a variety of clerical tasks, including using the computer to prepare documents and interact with staff, clients, and the public. This series of courses offers students the foundation for learning important soft skills, basic office skills, and using the computer software necessary to work in a general office setting.
20cef006-5767-45a6-80d8-fbbdea7a79ac.name: General Office Clerk

alignments.name: California Community Colleges State Chancellor's Office

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take FOUR (4) courses: Introduction to Word Processing Using MS Word; Introduction to Spreadsheets Using MS Excel; and Employability or  VESL: English for Work 2

bb88ddea-24fa-436c-9e02-68d5f58d7754.description: Earners of the ESL Enhanced Speaking Capstone Certificate are students with needed speaking fluency to prepare them to take other noncredit or credit classes, make progress in a career path, or transition to other programs at public and private institutions.
bb88ddea-24fa-436c-9e02-68d5f58d7754.name: ESL Enhanced Speaking Capstone

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, Take TWO (2) courses: Choose one from Conversation 1 or Conversation 2 and Choose one from Topics in English as a Second Language; ESL Community Learning Center; or American English Pronunciation.

1bb8d9f3-cf0d-4f11-ad3e-ecd2e30f57c1.description: Earners of the Childcare Workers certificate are students with knowledge about the care and development of infants, toddlers, and pre-school children for family childcare providers. Students have learned about health information required for licensing and skills necessary for the successful operation of a childcare business.
1bb8d9f3-cf0d-4f11-ad3e-ecd2e30f57c1.name: Childcare Workers

alignments.name: California Community Colleges State Chancellor's Office, California Department of Social Services

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take FIVE (5) courses: Early Childhood Care and Development for Family Child Care; Health Education for Family Day Care Providers; Business Practices in Family Day Care; Introduction on How to Start a Small Business; and Employability or VESL: English for Work 2

0eec5662-dcff-4941-8e65-39e283021cc4.description: The Certificate of Competency in ESL Intermediate Communication develops the ability of limited-English speaking students in non-verbal communication skills and the use of formal and colloquial language in preparation for enhanced job opportunities, the transition to academic studies, and increased community participation.
0eec5662-dcff-4941-8e65-39e283021cc4.name: Certificate of Competency ESL Intermediate Communication

badge_template_activities.title: Take courses: ESL-507 Conversation 1 and ESL-580 Conversation 2 *Note: Credit will be awarded for ESL-507 if the student achieves a higher placement mark during the ESL assessment test.

3fd95459-508c-43f9-bee5-24d22355f87c.description: Earners of the Digital Literacy for Academic and Professional Success I Certificate are students with basic technical knowledge, basic English language skills and vocabulary knowledge, and the confidence needed for social and academic growth through digital literacy competencies to make a successful transition to office technology programs in Career Education.
3fd95459-508c-43f9-bee5-24d22355f87c.name: Digital Literacy for Academic and Professional Success I

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take TWO (2) courses: Choose one (1) from Beginning Low; Beginning High; Intermediate Low; Intermediate High; Advanced Low; Advanced High; Academic Beginning A; Academic Beginning B; Academic Intermediate A; or Academic Intermediate B and Choose one (1) from Digital Literacy for Academic and Professional Success - Tier 1 or Digital Literacy for Academic and Professional Success - Tier 2.

33f9d914-29a6-4af9-b3d2-4db4f07b9a57.description: Secretaries and administrative assistants perform routine clerical and administrative duties. They organize files, prepare documents, schedule appointments, and support other staff. This series of courses help students prepare for office support positions that might require enhanced keyboarding skills and higher-level office management skills
33f9d914-29a6-4af9-b3d2-4db4f07b9a57.name: Secretary/Administrative Assistant

alignments.name: California Community Colleges State Chancellor's Office.

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take FOUR (4) courses: Introduction to Keyboarding II; Introduction to Microsoft Outlook; Choose One: Employability or  VESL: English for Work 2; and Choose One:  Introduction to Databases Using Microsoft Access; Introduction to Desktop Publishing Using Microsoft Publisher; Introduction to Electronic Presentations Using Powerpoint

20fa92fb-8027-4a79-bed1-87a7d291eaa2.description: The Certificate of Competency in ESL Advanced improves limited- English speaking students’ communication skills in English with an emphasis on grammar and writing in preparation for enhanced job opportunities and the transition to academic studies.
20fa92fb-8027-4a79-bed1-87a7d291eaa2.name: Certificate of Competency in ESL Beginning

badge_template_activities.title: Take courses ESL 301-Beginning Low and ESL 302-Beginning High *Note: Credit will be awarded for ESL-301 if the student achieves a higher placement mark during the ESL assessment test.

15446788-3708-4675-bd6b-47571ec62b91.description: Earners of the Digital Literacy for Academic and Professional Success II Certificate are students with an intermediate and higher level of technical knowledge, advanced English language skills, and vocabulary knowledge, and have the confidence needed for social and academic growth through advanced digital literacy competencies to make a successful transition to office technology programs in Career Education
15446788-3708-4675-bd6b-47571ec62b91.name: Digital Literacy for Academic and Professional Success II

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, Take TWO (2) courses: Choose one(1) from Beginning Low; Beginning High; Intermediate Low; Intermediate High; Advanced Low; Advanced High;  Academic Beginning A; Academic Beginning B; Academic Intermediate A; or Academic Intermediate B and Choose one (1) from Digital Literacy for Academic and Professional Success - Tier 3 or Digital Literacy for Real World Application - Tier 4

3d3eab79-f334-423b-803c-8c9e2d0e4467.description: Earners of the Leadership Capstone Certificate are students who will know and exemplify leadership techniques to become effective leaders in their workplace, home, school, and community.
3d3eab79-f334-423b-803c-8c9e2d0e4467.name: Leadership Capstone

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take TWO (2) courses: Leadership Basics, Part 1; and Leadership Basics, Part 2

a4ba6a99-5ede-4967-8452-b622be65f8df.description: The Certificate of Completion in Medical Billing is designed to give students the necessary knowledge and skills to hold a medical billing position. Students will have practical experience using computers, medical coding, and patient billing software, be familiar with the rules and guidelines of health care plans in order to submit proper documentation for appropriate reimbursement of services rendered and have the necessary customer service skills to succeed in this field.
a4ba6a99-5ede-4967-8452-b622be65f8df.name: Certificate of Completion Medical Billing

badge_template_activities.title: Take Courses: VBUS-119 Introduction to Keyboarding and Basic Windows, VMED-090 Introduction to Medical Coding, VMED-091 Introduction to Medical Billing, and WKPR-500 Workforce Readiness

6d1c3715-86cd-4615-a68b-0fb17a61dd28.description: Earners of the ESL Core Capstone Certificate are students with knowledge of English needed to prepare them to register in academic/vocational courses, for increased career opportunities, and to be active civic participants.
6d1c3715-86cd-4615-a68b-0fb17a61dd28.name: ESL Core Capstone

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, Take FOUR (4) courses: Choose three (3) from Intermediate High; Advanced Low; Advanced High; Academic Beginning B; Academic Intermediate A; or Academic Intermediate B and Choose one (1) from ABE Reading: ABE Writing; Advanced Writing & Grammar Review; ESL Transition to College Class;  GED Test Preparation; Reading Proficiency Development; Building Reading Skills 1; HS Equivalency Test Preparation; Intensive Writing & Grammar or Employability Skills.

a92a3e8f-a692-4d58-a68a-c917beee5361.description: This program prepares students to assist the elderly, convalescents, or persons with disabilities with daily living activities at the person's home or in a care facility. In a simulated caregiving environment, students will gain experience performing caregiver duties, which may include nutrition, cleanliness, ambulation, and household activities.
a92a3e8f-a692-4d58-a68a-c917beee5361.name: Certificate of Completion Caregiver / Personal Care Aide

badge_template_activities.title: Take Courses: VMED030- Introduction to Caregiving and VMED031 Caregiver Training

0d995517-c7d7-42ba-ae64-29f88317bdb3.description: Earners of the ESL Enhanced Civics Certificate are students that have knowledge of civics to be active in civics engagement opportunities, be ready for Citizenship courses, and also participate in the community with needed speaking fluency to prepare them to take noncredit or credit classes, make progress in a career path, or transition to other programs at public and private institutions.
0d995517-c7d7-42ba-ae64-29f88317bdb3.name: ESL Enhanced Civics

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, Take TWO (2) courses: ESL Civics; Topics in English as a Second Language; Writing and Computers: Developing a School Publications; or ESL Community Learning Center.

7cb3197b-e4bc-46c8-8586-528e79de62cc.description: Earners are prepared to work in a wide variety of business settings, with the focus being on attending to and meeting the customer's needs and requests. Students will have the opportunity to strengthen or improve their current customer service, interpersonal, communication, listening, patience, and problem-solving qualities.
7cb3197b-e4bc-46c8-8586-528e79de62cc.name: Customer Service Representative

alignments.name: California Community Colleges State Chancellor's Office

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take FOUR (4) courses: Introduction to Keyboarding I; Introduction to Customer Service; Choose ONE: Employability or  VESL: English for Work 2; and Choose ONE: Introduction to Windows; Navigating the Internet or Introduction to Microsoft Outlook

3ba897c1-cc59-437b-881a-8b06f617a7d0.description: Earners of the English for Work Certificate are students with basic language skills needed to communicate successfully at an English-speaking workplace. These students will be able to take other classes in vocational, credit, private programs, or other community-based organizations.
3ba897c1-cc59-437b-881a-8b06f617a7d0.name: ESL: English for Work

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, Take TWO (2) courses: ESL: English for Work 1 and ESL: English for Work 2.

36515da0-b9a7-4c24-bbb9-18760f9ce03e.description: Earners prepare English language and/or digital literacy learners for further education or training, employment, and careers. Students will engage in collaborative projects designed to help the student develop the professional and technical computer skills needed to succeed in today’s workforce. The certificate provides students with the foundational digital literacy skills to begin an office and administrative support career pathway.
36515da0-b9a7-4c24-bbb9-18760f9ce03e.name: Digital Literacy for Office and Administrative Support Worker

alignments.name: California Community Colleges State Chancellor's Office

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take FIVE (5) courses: Digital Literacy for Academic and Professional Success - Tier 1, Tier 2, Tier 3; Digital literacy for Real-World Application - Tier 4 and Employability or  VESL: English for Work 2

5fbecc28-48d9-4bdc-8d72-4870065346c3.description: This program is designed to prepare students to determine potential sales of a product or service by researching and analyzing market conditions in local, regional, or national areas. Students will learn methods of digital marketing and distribution, such as gathering information on competitors, prices, and sales. An emphasis is placed on the use of digital marketing technology to create a marketing campaign.
5fbecc28-48d9-4bdc-8d72-4870065346c3.name: Certificate of Completion Digital Marketing Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Take Courses: VBUS-014 Introduction to Mobile and Social Media Tools, VBUS-150 Introduction to Digital Marketing, and VBUS-152 Introduction to Digital Marketing Analytics

d197bc50-ceef-4329-a3fd-8c5cb83268cc.description: The Certificate teaches students how to use a 3D printer and the technology behind 3D printing. Students will learn about the different plastic filaments, techniques for feeding the plastic filament into the 3D printer for optimal performance, components of the printer, calibration techniques, software, design methods, and reducing defects. An emphasis is placed on the use of 3D printing in the areas of personal applications, engineering, design, and manufacturing.
d197bc50-ceef-4329-a3fd-8c5cb83268cc.name: Certificate of Completion 3D Printing / Advanced Manufacturing

badge_template_activities.title: Take Courses: VBUS-101 Intro to 3D Modeling using Blender, VBUS-105 Intro to 3D Animation using Blender and Intro to 3D Printing

f60bd60a-3f26-4c7a-a519-8e1f9f6adae9.description: Earners of the Adult Basic Education/Adult Secondary Education Reading Proficiency certificate are students who are prepared for higher-level reading skills used in High School courses, GED/HiSET Preparation, and college courses.
f60bd60a-3f26-4c7a-a519-8e1f9f6adae9.name: Adult Basic Education/Adult Secondary Education Reading Proficiency

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take TWO (2) courses: Adult Basic Education Reading; and choose one from Reading Proficiency Development; Building Reading Skills 1 or Reading Skills 2

2db1cf30-7996-4c14-a0f6-ca86e0bc9d0c.description: This program helps students discover the power of QuickBooks while learning basic accounting concepts through hands-on practice. Upon completion of the certificate program, students gain the skills they need to start their academic and career pathways in accounting. The certificate prepares students for entry-level clerk jobs that utilize QuickBooks. In addition, small business owners, acquire the skills to manage bookkeeping for their business.
2db1cf30-7996-4c14-a0f6-ca86e0bc9d0c.name: QuickBooks - Tier 1

alignments.name: California State Approved
alignments.description: Certificate meets the SAC Career Education standard of providing programs for students with the skills necessary to enter the workforce upon completion.

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take THREE (3) courses: Accounting Terminology; Introduction to Quickbooks; and Employability Skills or ESL: English for Work 2.

9358cc53-abed-4dd2-a8d7-0a06cb5b9479.description: The Certificate of Completion in Web Associate is designed to give students the necessary knowledge and skills to support providers and consumers of web services. The web associate utilizes the understanding of distributed web services to support advertising, marketing and sales staff in today’s global economy. Understanding and utilizing developed web applications is critical to finding new business for web design, Internet marketing, hosting, programming, and technology projects.
9358cc53-abed-4dd2-a8d7-0a06cb5b9479.name: Certificate of Completion Web Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Take Courses: VBUS-010 Introduction to Web Design using Adobe Dreamweaver, VBUS-107 Seminar in Adobe Tools, VBUS-242 Introduction to Vector Graphics, VBUS-302 Introduction to Web Page Development using HTML, and VBUS-303 Introduction to Electronic Imaging using Adobe Photoshop

3bf5f796-08b9-4aed-95c3-793e376a569e.description: This certificate is designed to prepare students for entry-level employment in the financial services sector. Emphasis is placed on preparation for the Securities Industry Essentials (SIE) exam. Topics covered: basic securities industry information, concepts fundamental to working in the industry, types of products and risks; structure of the markets, regulatory agencies, and prohibited practices. As well as digital assets, such as Bitcoin, and how they can be used in an investment plan.
3bf5f796-08b9-4aed-95c3-793e376a569e.name: Financial Advisor Preparation

badge_template_activities.title: Take Courses: VBUS-160 Introduction to Financial Services and Investments and VBUS-161 Introduction to Bitcoin and Digital Assets.

6fa8e14d-91f9-467b-b762-4f827d0bdc36.description: The Certificate of Competency in ESL Beginning Multilevel is designed to give fundamental reading, writing, listening, speaking, and digital literacy skills to limited-English speaking students, preparing them for enhanced job opportunities, academic studies, and increased community participation.
6fa8e14d-91f9-467b-b762-4f827d0bdc36.name: Certificate of Competency ESL Beginning Multilevel

badge_template_activities.title: Take courses: ESL-300 Literacy and ESL-440 Beginning Multilevel *Note: Credit will be awarded for ESL-300 if the student achieves a higher placement mark during the ESL assessment test.

ded6134e-2b4f-4342-ba98-a73148f34528.description: The Certificate of Competency in ESL Intermediate is designed to give essential reading, writing, listening, speaking, and digital literacy skills to limited-English speaking students in preparation for enhanced job opportunities, the transition to academic studies, and increased community participation.
ded6134e-2b4f-4342-ba98-a73148f34528.name: Certificate of Competency ESL Intermediate

badge_template_activities.title: Take courses: ESL-303 Intermediate Low and ESL-304 Intermediate High  *Note: Credit will be awarded for ESL-303 if the student achieves a higher placement mark during the ESL assessment test.

625a9399-a97d-4f2b-93fd-34412089f9c8.description: Earners will be prepared to meet the minimum training to apply to Santa Ana College Pharmacy program.
625a9399-a97d-4f2b-93fd-34412089f9c8.name: Introduction to Pharmacy Technology

alignments.name: California Community Colleges State Chancellor's Office, California State Board of Pharmacy

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take THREE (3) courses: Introduction to Pharmacy Technology; Principles of Mathematics and Employability or  VESL: English for Work 2

869041a6-b652-4897-9853-734dc537de46.description: The Certificate of Completion in Customer Service Representative is designed to give students the necessary knowledge and skills to deal directly with customers as the company representative in special problems that may arise. Students will be prepared to work as commercial or residential service representatives in positions in major department stores, collection agencies, credit bureaus, airlines, travel agencies, medical insurance agencies, public utilities, and telephone answering services.
869041a6-b652-4897-9853-734dc537de46.name: Certificate of Completion Customer Service Representative

badge_template_activities.title: Take Courses: VBUS-119 Intro to Keyboarding and Basic Windows, VBUS-258 Navigating the Interment, VBUS-260 Introduction to Word Processing using MS Word, and WKPR-500 Workforce Readiness

69633add-ea61-4f49-be9b-ed7ffb8d5fcb.description: Earners of the Enhanced English for Work Certificate are students with advanced language skills that include well-developed writing and digital literacy skills needed to communicate successfully at an English-speaking workplace. These students will be able to take other classes in vocational, credit, private programs, or other community-based organizations.
69633add-ea61-4f49-be9b-ed7ffb8d5fcb.name: ESL: Enhanced English for Work

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take TWO (2) courses: ESL: English for Work 1; ESL: English for Work 2; Topics in English as a Second Language; ESL Community Learning Center; or Basic Writing.

skills.name: Digital Literacy Skills For The Workplace

06428d71-ab2e-4e23-a20c-a0514916a72a.description: Designed to prepare students to obtain entry-level employment in information technology (IT) or pursue higher-level training at Santa Ana College. Students gain basic knowledge in hardware, operating systems, networking, security, and customer service. Hands-on training using computer components and operating systems provide an opportunity for students to enhance their skills in assembling, disassembling, servicing, troubleshooting, and upgrading computer and networking systems.
06428d71-ab2e-4e23-a20c-a0514916a72a.name: Introduction to Information Technology

alignments.name: Information Technology
alignments.description: In this certificate program, students have an opportunity to prepare for CompTIA's A+ Certification which is the IT industry standard for validating the foundational skills needed by today's computer support specialist.

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take THREE (3) courses: COMPTIA A+ Certification Preparation& Practice; Computer Basics: Systems and Networking Essentials; Introduction to Customer Service Skills; Employability Skills or ESL: English for Work 2

cf2df9c8-5d72-475a-9dca-a0f68292af8c.description: This training program allows students to master basic cooking techniques which can then be used to create an endless variety of dishes. Students have an opportunity to learn many aspects of food preparations, and the proper methods of presentation and serving. Students will also be prepared to take the ServSafe Food Protection Manager Certification Exam. In addition, the program prepares students to transition to Santa Ana College's Culinary Arts Program to continue their training.
cf2df9c8-5d72-475a-9dca-a0f68292af8c.name: Line Cook

alignments.name: California Community Colleges State Chancellor's Office, ServSafe

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take a total of FOUR (4) courses. Must pass all 3 courses VFOOD-200, VFOOD-005, VFOOD-210, and one of the following VBUS-400, HSMATH-190, or ESL-520
VFOOD-200 Line Cook Training
VFOOD-005 ServeSafe Food Handler
VFOOD-210 ServeSafe Food Protection Manager Certification Exam Preparation Review & Practice
VBUS-400 Employability
HSMTH-190 Math for College and Career Readiness
Or ESL-520 VESL: English for Work 2

42b7ad22-61e0-4984-92cc-a556594eb5bf.description: Earners of the Adult Basic Education certificate are students with basic reading, writing, and math skills necessary to succeed in high school courses, GED/HiSET preparation, and college courses.
42b7ad22-61e0-4984-92cc-a556594eb5bf.name: Adult Basic Education

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take THREE (3) courses: Adult Basic Education Reading; Adult Basic Education Writing; and Adult Basic Education Math

ed5abadb-f2a1-4aed-9310-3ccea8ce77f4.description: The Certificate of Completion in Receptionist/Information Clerk is designed to give students the skills for entry-level receptionist or information clerk positions. Clerical duties include greeting the public, answering phones, making appointments, and word processing.
ed5abadb-f2a1-4aed-9310-3ccea8ce77f4.name: Certificate of Completion Receptionist/Information Clerk

badge_template_activities.title: Take Courses:  VBUS-096 Introduction to Computer Software and WKPR-500 Workforce Readiness

ebd42d34-02d5-4630-8bc9-9850dc3685bf.description: Earners of the College Readiness certificate are students who successfully navigate transition into Career and Academic Pathways in college.
ebd42d34-02d5-4630-8bc9-9850dc3685bf.name: College Readiness

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take any TWO (2) from the following courses Composition 2, Introductory Algebra, Intensive Writing & Grammar, Digital Literacy for Academic and Professional Success - Tier 3 or Digital Literacy from Real World Application - Tier 4.

ff979881-89cd-436e-a223-74c7489fcb62.description: The Certificate of Completion in Office Technology is designed to prepare students in acquiring or improving critical thinking, communication skills, and basic online safety awareness necessary for employment.
ff979881-89cd-436e-a223-74c7489fcb62.name: Office Technology

badge_template_activities.title: Take Courses: WKPR009 Beginning Computers and WKPR018 Social Media and Online Safety in the Workplace.

08f93fed-ea5c-40f2-a8ba-4158a5048de8.description: Earners of the Secondary Education(High School Equivalency Test Preparation) Certificate are students who will develop strong reading, writing, math, science and social study skills to successfully pass the High School Equivalency exams (GED and HiSET). These students will also be highly prepared to transition to college and/or to enter the workforce.
08f93fed-ea5c-40f2-a8ba-4158a5048de8.name: Secondary Education (High School Equivalency Test Preparation) Certificate of Completion

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take TWO (2) courses: Choose one from GED Test Preparation or High School Equivalency Test Preparation, and Choose one from Adult Basic Education Reading; Adult Basic Education Writing; Adult Basic Education Math; Beginning Spanish Literacy; Intermediate Spanish Literacy; or Advanced Spanish Literacy

b1e5057f-d322-4d04-9526-f8f7c1647288.description: The Certificate of Completion in Technical Skills for Higher Learning is designed to provide students with intellectual, developmental, and learning disabilities the necessary knowledge and technical skills for entry-level support employment and continuing education.
b1e5057f-d322-4d04-9526-f8f7c1647288.name: Technical Skills for Higher Learning

badge_template_activities.title: Take Courses: WKPR008 Building Critical Thinking Skills and WKPR009 Beginning Computers.

45538546-4a30-471e-821a-a624507bc96a.description: Earners of the Adult Basic Education/Adult Secondary Education Math Proficiency certificate are students who are prepared for higher-level math skills used in High School courses, GED/HiSET Preparation, and college courses.
45538546-4a30-471e-821a-a624507bc96a.name: Adult Basic Education/Adult Secondary Education Math Proficiency

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take TWO (2) courses: Adult Basic Education Math and Math Fundamentals 2

eb7702b0-bc83-4407-b998-1d51c75f3e95.description: Earners of the Adult Basic Education/Adult Secondary Education Writing Proficiency certificate are students who are prepared for higher-level writing skills used in High School courses, GED/HiSET Preparation, and college courses.
eb7702b0-bc83-4407-b998-1d51c75f3e95.name: Adult Basic Education/Adult Secondary Education Writing Proficiency

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take TWO (2) courses: Adult Basic Education Writing and Composition 1

5d6e48c9-13e0-4a1a-92c9-4bcdf4c74205.description: The Certificate of Competency in Enhanced Beginning ESL Skills improves the reading, writing, listening, speaking, and employability skills of Beginning ESL students for better communication and personal growth.
5d6e48c9-13e0-4a1a-92c9-4bcdf4c74205.name: Certificate of Competency Enhanced Beginning ESL Skills

badge_template_activities.title: Take courses: ESL-250 Seminar for Beginning ESL Students and ESL-530 American English Pronunciation

5eba58fd-3885-408f-b5d9-2d3d792c5e17.description: The Certificate of Competency in ESL Advanced improves limited- English speaking students’ communication skills in English with an emphasis on grammar and writing in preparation for enhanced job opportunities and the transition to academic studies.
5eba58fd-3885-408f-b5d9-2d3d792c5e17.name: Certificate of Competency ESL Advanced

badge_template_activities.title: Take courses: ESL-305 Advanced Low and ESL-306 Advanced High  *Note: Credit will be awarded for ESL-305 if the student achieves a higher placement mark during the ESL assessment test.

9a3d3152-0f30-41c3-aee7-b73b61e12d8c.description: The Certificate of Competency in ESL Civics enhances the English language skills of limited English-speaking students while preparing them for the United States Citizenship Exam and civic preparation.
9a3d3152-0f30-41c3-aee7-b73b61e12d8c.name: Certificate of Competency ESL Civics

badge_template_activities.title: Take courses: ESL-120 ESL Civics and ESL-303 Intermediate Low

cbeb1866-045f-488b-9e30-308a1766f18d.description: The Certificate of Competency in ESL Intermediate Multilevel develops the ability of limited-English speaking students in a variety of advanced written, interpersonal, and academic communication tasks in preparation for enhanced job opportunities and the transition to academic studies.
cbeb1866-045f-488b-9e30-308a1766f18d.name: Certificate of Competency ESL Intermediate Multilevel

badge_template_activities.title: Take courses: ESL-303 Intermediate Low and ESL-500 Intermediate Multilevel *Note: Credit will be awarded for ESL-303 if the student achieves a higher placement mark during the ESL assessment test.

6534a668-140c-4d30-9f2e-cda0b9ee2aff.description: The Certificate of Completion in Executive Secretary/Administrative Assistant is designed to give students the necessary knowledge and skills from diversified training, including technology, and background to hold high-level administrative support positions of responsibility in the workplace. Students will be prepared to conduct research, prepare reports, and perform clerical functions such as preparing correspondence, receiving visitors, arranging conference calls, and scheduling meetings.
6534a668-140c-4d30-9f2e-cda0b9ee2aff.name: Certificate of Completion Executive Secretary / Administrative Assistant

badge_template_activities.title: Take Courses: VBUS-013 Introduction to Personal Management using MS Outlook, VBUS-260 Introduction to Word Processing using MS Word, VBUS-261 Introduction to Databases using MS Access, VBUS-262 Introduction to Spreadsheets using MS Excel, VBUS-304 Introduction to Electronic Presentations using MS PowerPoint, and WKPR-500 Workforce Readiness

5a288b3e-1dbb-4f27-91e9-841ca2011135.description: The Certificate of Completion in First-Line Supervisor/Manager, Office and Administrative Support Workers is designed for both entry-level and experienced office workers looking for a promotion. Graduates will have expert office skills and in-depth software knowledge. The program provides training in office information systems and communications, work process and organizational performance improvement, business decision-making, project management, and capital and human resource management.
5a288b3e-1dbb-4f27-91e9-841ca2011135.name: Certificate of Completion First-Line Supervisor /Manager, Office and Administrative Support Workers

badge_template_activities.title: Take Courses: VBUS-014 Introduction Mobile and Social Media, VBUS-097 Introduction to Personal Commerce on the Internet, VBUS-103 Introduction to MS Project, VBUS-118 Introduction to Windows, VBUS-257 Seminar in Business Applications, VBUS-260 Introduction to Word Processing using MS Word, VBUS-262 Introduction to Spreadsheets using MS Excel, and VBUS-304 Introduction to Electronic Presentations using MS PowerPoint

3aa4617d-ad00-4a3c-8079-6486286a427b.description: The Certificate of Completion in General Office Clerk is designed to give students the skills for entry-level positions in the business world. Clerk typist, credit clerk, file clerk, general clerk, receptionist, or data entry clerk positions require limited knowledge of office management systems and procedures. Clerical duties include skills in answering telephones, bookkeeping, typing or word processing, office machine operation, and filing.
3aa4617d-ad00-4a3c-8079-6486286a427b.name: Certification of Completion General Office Clerk

badge_template_activities.title: Take Courses:  VBUS-118 Introduction to Windows, VBUS-119 Introduction to Keyboarding and Basic Windows, VBUS-140 Introduction to Google Applications for Work, VBUS-258 Navigating the Internet, VBUS-260 Introduction to Word Processing using MS Word, VBUS-262 Introduction to Spreadsheets using MS Excel, and WKPR-500 Workforce Readiness

a5657626-3c8c-4dfb-9eac-4fcff58c5934.description: Earners of the ESL Enhanced Writing Capstone Certificate are students with a high degree of writing proficiency that will prepare them for other courses in other programs that require different types of writing skills and abilities based on diverse topics. These students will be prepared to write extensively in academic settings and in different workplace environments.
a5657626-3c8c-4dfb-9eac-4fcff58c5934.name: ESL Enhanced Writing Capstone

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, Take THREE (3) courses: Basic Writing; Intermediate Writing; Advanced Writing and Grammar; or Advanced Writing and Grammar Review.

4e52a9ea-b255-4363-9645-f54f0a848cd2.description: Earners of the ESL Transition to Adult Secondary Education Certificate are students with high school level reading and writing skills to be prepared to enroll in the Adult Secondary Education Program and language skills and abilities that can be used to prepare to take advanced Career Education, Adult Basic Education, and other program courses leading to certificates or degrees.
4e52a9ea-b255-4363-9645-f54f0a848cd2.name: ESL Transition To Adult Secondary Education (ASE)

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, Take TWO (2) courses: Advanced Writing and Grammar Review and Choose ONE (1) from Reading Proficiency Development; Building Reading Skills 1; Navigating the Internet; Introduction to Word Processing Using MS Word; or Intensive Writing and Grammar.

68e5a927-735d-46fc-92d8-7dfaf17485c7.description: This certificate program prepares students to transition to Santa Ana College's Biotechnology Lab Assistant Certificate Program or obtain entry-level employment in the biotechnology field. Students will learn how to operate and maintain standard laboratory equipment.
68e5a927-735d-46fc-92d8-7dfaf17485c7.name: Introduction to Biotechnology

alignments.name: California State Approved
alignments.description: Certificate meets the SAC Career Education standard of providing programs for students with the skills necessary to enter the workforce upon completion.

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take THREE (3) courses: Introduction to Biotechnology; Introductory Biotech Lab; and Employability or  VESL: English for Work 2

6f4dd2f8-9cd2-4213-94dc-097c252fc164.description: Prepare students to transition to Santa Ana College's Welding Technology Program or to obtain entry-level employment. Introduced to shop safety, proper use of tools and the basic equipment, and basic fundamentals through the introduction of various welding processes currently used in the welding and metal fabrication industry. Processes include Oxy-fuel cutting, Shielded Metal Arc Welding (SMAW), Gas Metal Arc Welding (GMAW), Flux Cored Arc Welding (FCAW), and Gas Tungsten Arc Welding (GTAW).
6f4dd2f8-9cd2-4213-94dc-097c252fc164.name: Welding Technology

alignments.name: California State Approved
alignments.description: Certificate meets the SAC Career Education standard of providing programs for students with the skills necessary to enter the workforce upon completion.

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take THREE (3) courses: Introduction to Welding; Math for College and Career Readiness; and Introduction to Customer Service Skills or Employability Skills or English for Work 2.

dc3474c9-a77a-47a2-a06e-d8fa009be88a.description: Earners of the 21st Century Leadership Certificate will be prepared with the necessary leadership, digital literacy, and computer skills that are essential in obtaining a livable wage and maintaining employment. The series of these classes will provide students with a better understanding of the leadership and technical skills that adults need to be successful in school, at work, and in their communities.
dc3474c9-a77a-47a2-a06e-d8fa009be88a.name: 21st. Century Leadership

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take THREE (3) courses: Leadership Basics Part 1, Leadership Part 2; Practical Computer & Internet Skills for Parents and Guardians; Digital Literacy for Academic and Professional - Tier 1, or Tier 2, or Tier 3; Digital Literacy for Real-World Applications Tier 4.

b695aad1-b295-4488-b9ac-9e13d8ce0bc0.description: Earners of the Academic ESL Advanced Certificate are students with advanced level academic language skills and abilities that can be used to prepare to take advanced Career Education, Adult Basic Education, and other program courses leading to certificates or degrees.
b695aad1-b295-4488-b9ac-9e13d8ce0bc0.name: Academic ESL Advance

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take TWO (2) courses: Academic Advanced Low and Academic Advanced High.

e0adfffa-9ccf-4193-a16b-45c361bb0808.description: Earners of the Academic ESL Capstone Certificate are students with accumulated language skills and abilities that can be used to prepare to take Adult Secondary Education and entry college level and vocational training courses leading to certificates or degrees.
e0adfffa-9ccf-4193-a16b-45c361bb0808.name: Academic ESL Capstone

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take THREE (3) courses: Both Academic Intermediate A and Academic Intermediate B and Choose ONE (1) from Adult Basic Education Reading; Adult Basic Education Writing; Advanced Writing and Grammar Review; ESL Transition to College Class; GED Test Preparation; REading Proficiency Development; Building Reading Skills 1; High School Equivalency Test Preparation; Intensive Writing and Grammar; and Employability Skills.

5f5f8c4d-3216-4a75-b9d2-a365c7952b56.description: Earners of the Academic ESL Advanced Certificate are students with advanced level academic language skills and abilities that can be used to prepare to take advanced Career Education, Adult Basic Education, and other program courses leading to certificates or degrees.
5f5f8c4d-3216-4a75-b9d2-a365c7952b56.name: Academic ESL Intermediate 2021

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take TWO (2) courses: Academic Intermediate Low and Academic Intermediate High.

e89a9294-05fd-42ce-9549-b025fb37ebc0.description: This certificate program prepares students to transition to Santa Ana College's Automotive Technology Program or obtain entry-level employment in the automotive technology field. Students will learn about the primary automotive systems used in modern vehicles such as electrical, ignition, fuel, braking, and other systems. Students will be equipped with the skills and theory necessary to perform maintenance on these systems.
e89a9294-05fd-42ce-9549-b025fb37ebc0.name: Automotive Technology

alignments.name: California State approved
alignments.description: Certificate meets the SAC Career Education standard of providing programs for students with the skills necessary to enter the workforce upon completion.

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take THREE (3) courses: Introduction to Automotive Vehicle Systems; Math for College and Career Readiness and  Introduction to Customer Service Skills or Employability Skills or English for Work 2.

9805ad54-f2a3-4d18-8d0d-bec93ff95a5e.description: The Certificate of Completion in Basic Employment Skills is designed to provide strategies to reinforce and maintain money handling, reading, and writing skills necessary for entry-level employment.
9805ad54-f2a3-4d18-8d0d-bec93ff95a5e.name: Basic Employment Skills

badge_template_activities.title: Take Courses: WKPR012 - Applying Reading Skills on the Job, WKPR013 - Applying Writing Skills on the Job and, WKPR017 - Applying Math Skills on the Job

c1221f46-2611-4a4f-827b-f83142652a5d.description: Certificate earner will be equipped with the ability to manage or improve many workplace issues that will lead to productivity. Students have the opportunity to develop and practice the power, writing, and computer skills they need to be effective on a daily basis in the workplace. Combined with industry knowledge and behaviors, the mastery of these skills results in higher levels of individual performance and growth. recommended for students who are currently in the workforce.
c1221f46-2611-4a4f-827b-f83142652a5d.name: Career & Professional Success

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take TWO (2) courses: Effective Writing for the Workplace; Introduction to Computer Software & Online Applications; or Workforce Power Skills.

bfb9a454-9131-48ed-8b41-752d9cba1036.description: This certificate program prepares students to assist the elderly, convalescents, or persons with disabilities with daily living activities at the person's home or in a care facility. In a simulated care giving environment, students will gain experience performing caregiver duties, which may include nutrition, cleanliness, ambulation, and household activities.
bfb9a454-9131-48ed-8b41-752d9cba1036.name: Caregiver/Personal Care Aide

alignments.name: California Community Colleges State Chancellor's Office
alignments.description: Certificate meets the SAC Career Education standard of providing programs for students with the skills necessary to enter the workforce upon completion. Certificate meets the SAC Career Education standard of providing programs for students with the skills necessary to enter the workforce upon completion.

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take THREE (3) courses. Must pass both VHLTH-109 and VHLTH-110, and one of the following courses VBUS-400 or ESL-520.
VHLTH-109 Introductions to Caregiving
VHLTH-110 ; Caregiver Training
VBUS-400 Employability
Or ESL-520 VESL: English for Work 2

083ae7af-ca8c-4556-99d1-0cf7db7de11b.description: The Certificate of Competency in Enhanced Advanced ESL Skills is designed to improve thereading, writing, listening, speaking, and digital literacy skills of Advanced English as a SecondLanguage students for effective communication and personal growth.
083ae7af-ca8c-4556-99d1-0cf7db7de11b.name: Certificate of Competency Enhanced Advanced ESL Skills

badge_template_activities.title: Take courses: ESL-270 Seminar for Advanced ESL Students and ESL-601 Advanced Grammar and Writing

a9ab4797-5a23-49da-a4df-22f32e00c1c2.description: The Certificate of Competency in Enhanced Intermediate ESL Skills is designed to improve the reading, writing, listening, speaking, employability, and digital literacy skills of Intermediate English as a Second Language students for better communication and personal growth.
a9ab4797-5a23-49da-a4df-22f32e00c1c2.name: Certificate of Competency Enhanced Intermediate ESL Skills

badge_template_activities.title: Take courses: ESL-010 ESL Writing and ESL-260 Seminar for Intermediate ESL

31f49b2e-81db-4fe2-a3e0-ebc49a65d0c2.description: The certificate of competency in ESL Communication improves the English language skills of limited English-speaking students with an emphasis on speaking and pronunciation.
31f49b2e-81db-4fe2-a3e0-ebc49a65d0c2.name: Certificate of Competency ESL Communication

badge_template_activities.title: Take courses: ESL-303 Intermediate Low and ESL-530 American English

45de8b30-d758-462a-954d-63afc25f5bc5.description: The Certificate of Competency in ESL Intermediate Writing develops the ability of limited-English speaking students in composition and other essential written communication skills in preparation for enhanced job opportunities and the transition to academic studies.
45de8b30-d758-462a-954d-63afc25f5bc5.name: Certificate of Competency ESL Intermediate Writing

badge_template_activities.title: Take courses: ESL-010 ESL Writing and ESL-303 Intermediate Low

d71a27f0-dc3f-48e6-a35f-99afc2cff970.description: The Certificate of Competency in ESL Literacy develops the ability of non-English speaking students in basic literacy skills, including letter and number recognition/production, simple personal information, and basic oral communication in preparation for enhanced job opportunities.
d71a27f0-dc3f-48e6-a35f-99afc2cff970.name: Certificate of Competency ESL Literacy

badge_template_activities.title: Take courses: ABE-011 Native Language Basic Skills for Adults and ESL-300 Literacy

8b252c76-dd57-43ff-99d0-17a2b60978a9.description: The Certificate of Competency in Vocational ESL develops the English language and workplace skills of limited-English speaking students.
8b252c76-dd57-43ff-99d0-17a2b60978a9.name: Certificate of Competency Vocational ESL

badge_template_activities.title: Take courses: ESL-510 English for Work 1 and ESL-520 English for Work 2

efc8f174-5987-47e8-9b48-47e33187e6e5.description: The Certificate of Completion in Home-Based Business is designed to give students the necessary knowledge and skills to plan, develop, and operate a home-based business. The business operator utilizes the understanding of business concepts, strategies, and technology to shape ideas into opportunities supported by research, data, and business models. Effectively utilizing web and business applications is essential to sustaining the long-term growth of the business.
efc8f174-5987-47e8-9b48-47e33187e6e5.name: Certificate of Completion Home-Based Business

badge_template_activities.title: Take Courses:  VBUS-014 Introduction to Mobile and Social Media Tools, VBUS-030 How to Build a Home-Based Business, VBUS-040 Accounting for Non-Accountants, VBUS-097 Introduction to Personal Commerce on the Internet

skills.name: Knowledge Of The Core Concepts In Business Analysis

d6dd0f78-34fc-4826-908d-f4201408ba6b.description: The Certificate of Completion in Multi-Media Artists and Animators is designed to develop the technical and creative knowledge and skills necessary for employment in the entertainment industry.
d6dd0f78-34fc-4826-908d-f4201408ba6b.name: Certificate of Completion Multi-Media Artists and Animators

badge_template_activities.title: Take Courses:  VBUS-096 Introduction to Use of Digital Camera, VBUS-101 Introduction to 3D modeling using Blender, VBUS-105 Introduction to 3D Animation using Blender, VBUS-109 Introduction to Desktop Video Editing using Adobe Premiere, VBUS-120 Introduction to Animations using Adobe Animate

6ec25719-4ada-4959-b251-6fae1530b065.description: The Certificate of Completion in Communication Skills for Adults is designed to develop the foundational communication skills necessary for successful employment and continuing education.
6ec25719-4ada-4959-b251-6fae1530b065.name: Effective Communication Skills

badge_template_activities.title: Take Courses: WKPR002 Self-Advocacy, WKPR006 Communication Skills for Successful Employment, WKPR007 Social Skills and Necessary Etiquette and, WKPR008 Building Critical Thinking Skills

643296ea-be25-465f-b69e-dec728fca9cf.description: Provides courses designed to meet specific needs of students with intellectual and learning disabilities focusing on basic education and job skills. Provides certificate programs in educational and employment areas with opportunities to transfer to content courses or directly into the workforce.
643296ea-be25-465f-b69e-dec728fca9cf.name: Employment Readiness

badge_template_activities.title: Take Courses: WKPR003 Getting Around Town, WKPR004 Choosing the Right Employment Path and, WKPR005 Safety on the Job.

2b47ed91-8f5d-4399-b3e4-9556352856b6.description: Earners of the ESL College Reading and Writing Certificate are students with a high degree of writing skills and reading proficiency so they are prepared to take other courses in programs leading to certificates or degrees.
2b47ed91-8f5d-4399-b3e4-9556352856b6.name: ESL College Reading and Writing

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate student must complete both ESL 612 and ESL 613.
ESL 612 College Reading and Writing I
ESL 613 College Reading and Writing II

65f91354-3528-499f-9618-48104188ce9e.description: Earners of the ESL Grammar for Better Writing Certificate are students with a high degree of writing skills including grammar proficiency so they are prepared to take other courses in programs leading to certificates or degrees.
65f91354-3528-499f-9618-48104188ce9e.name: ESL Grammar for Better Writing

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate student must complete both ESL 610 and ELS 611.
ESL 610 Grammar for Better Writing I
ESL 611 Grammar for Better Writing II

d53d5951-07d3-4452-90de-89915b78f63a.description: Earners of the ESL Writing and Developing a School Publication Certificate are students with writing skills for publishing school newsletters and other publications. These students also learn interviewing skills so they are prepared to take other courses in programs leading to certificates or degrees.
d53d5951-07d3-4452-90de-89915b78f63a.name: ESL Writing and Developing a School Publication

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate student must complete both ESL 392 and VBUS 502.
ESL 392 Writing and Developing a School Publication
VBUS 502 Digital Literacy for Academic and Professional Success-Tier 3

57643699-b5f9-4d2a-88ae-82893e328718.description: The Certificate of Completion in General Medical Office Clerk is designed to prepare students in acquiring or improving critical thinking, communications skills, and basic clerical skills necessary to work in a variety of hospital departments.
57643699-b5f9-4d2a-88ae-82893e328718.name: General Medical Office Clerk

badge_template_activities.title: Take Courses: WKPR007 Social Skills and Necessary Etiquette, WKPR010 Customer Service for the Medical Field, and WKPR016 Long Term Competitive Employment Training.

053a0816-c7ac-4fc4-82c9-233f2b2c4c56.description: Earners will have competence in the program areas of safety, basic refrigeration, basic electricity, heating, air-conditioning, ventilation, and soft skills. Students will possess entry-level skills in the repair and servicing of refrigeration, air conditioning, and heating equipment used in residential, industrial, and commercial buildings
053a0816-c7ac-4fc4-82c9-233f2b2c4c56.name: Heating/Ventilation/Air Conditioning /Refrigeration (HVAC-R) Technology

alignments.name: California Community Colleges State Chancellor's Office

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take TWO (2) courses: Heating/Ventilation/Air Conditioning/Refrigeration (HVAC-R) technology and Employability or  VESL: English for Work 2

605ac653-f5c4-4961-8338-72a3c943827a.description: Earners explore careers in hospitality, specifically in food services and hotel/motel/resort front desk; understand the advantages and challenges of each, and use self-assessment tools to determine which is right for them. The program emphasizes customer service and its importance, helping students understand customer behavior and loyalty in a diverse and increasingly global society. Students will also learn techniques and tips for finding work in the hospitality industry.
605ac653-f5c4-4961-8338-72a3c943827a.name: Hospitality Services

alignments.name: California Community Colleges State Chancellor's Office, ServSafe

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take FOUR (4) courses: Career Focus - Hospitality Services; Introduction to Consumer Services Skills; Choose one: Introduction to Windows or ServSafe Food Handler and Choose one: Employability or  VESL: English for Work 2

8ca73091-4948-49bb-84af-3a15fbeb16de.description: This hands-on certificate program focuses on the fundamentals of baking and pastry principles and techniques. It prepares students for a career as a baker, pastry cook in hotels, restaurants, bakeries or even their own home business. It covers various topics, from bread, pastries, cakes, and decoration. Students will also be prepared to take the ServSafe Food Handler Exam, an industry-recognized certification that employers demand. In VBUS 400 Employability
8ca73091-4948-49bb-84af-3a15fbeb16de.name: Introduction to Baking & Pastry Tier 1

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate student must complete a total of 4 courses.
VFOOD 212 Baking & Pastry Master Class
VFOOD 214 Bread Making Master Class
VFOOD 216 Cakes and Decorating Master Class

f317fc71-3f1f-4917-b562-3268d7aa3838.description: This series of courses prepares students to transition to Santa Ana College's Culinary Arts program to advance their training. This hands-on certificate program focuses on the fundamentals of baking and pastry principles and techniques. It also prepares students for a career as a baker, or pastry cook in hotels, restaurants, bakeries or even their own home business. It covers a broad range of topics ranging from fundamental baking skills for students who intend to specialize in baking and pastry
f317fc71-3f1f-4917-b562-3268d7aa3838.name: Introduction to Baking & Pastry Tier 2

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate student must complete a total of five (5) courses.
Required: VFOOD 220 Introduction to Baking & Pastry
VFOOD 212 Baking & Pastry Master Class
VFOOD 214 Bread Making Master Class
VFOOD 216 Cakes and Decorating Master Class

3d73ac89-ebc4-46fa-beb0-b9a437b5a89c.description: This training program prepares students to transition to Santa Ana College's Diesel and Heavy Equipment Program or obtain entry-level employment in the diesel and heavy equipment field. Students learn the basic knowledge and skills in light, medium, and heavy-duty truck maintenance. Safety, inspections, and hands-on practice are emphasized.
3d73ac89-ebc4-46fa-beb0-b9a437b5a89c.name: Introduction to Diesel

alignments.name: California State Aprrove
alignments.description: Certificate meets the SAC Career Education standard of providing programs for students with the skills necessary to enter the workforce upon completion.

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take THREE (3) courses: Truck Preventative Maintenance; Math or College; and Career Readiness; and Employability or ESL: English for Work 2.

630b51f5-4740-49fa-951f-3378f87a98b7.description: These courses prepare students to transition to Santa Ana College's Manufacturing Technology Program. Students will learn the fundamental operations on lathes, milling machines, grinders, and drill pressers, including precision measurements and layout. Students will be equipped with the skills and theory necessary to enter or upgrade within the machinist trade.
630b51f5-4740-49fa-951f-3378f87a98b7.name: Introduction to Machining

alignments.name: California Community Colleges State Chancellor's Office, CNC Machine industry standards

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take THREE (3) courses: Basic Machining Concepts and Operations; Math Fundamentals 1; and Employability or  VESL: English for Work 2

20182d1e-bea4-47c4-8539-0ea91360fbac.description: The first steps in starting a business or expanding it. Students will learn commonly used business terminology, obtain strategies on how to jump-start a business, develop a business plan, use Quickbooks to manage bookkeeping for business and review financial reports, understand federal, state, and local laws, permits, licenses, and marketing, able to address the challenges/opportunities specific to small business management and prepared to transition to college.
20182d1e-bea4-47c4-8539-0ea91360fbac.name: Introduction to Small Business & Entrepreneurship

alignments.name: California State Approved
alignments.description: Certificate meets the SAC Career Education standard of providing programs for students with the skills necessary to enter the workforce upon completion.

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take FOUR (4) courses: Introduction to Quickbooks; Business Terminology; Introduction to How to Start a Small Business; and Introduction to Customer Service Skills or English for Work 2 or Leadership Basics, Part 2 or Leadership Basics, Part 1.

c8f86b43-2ba5-48ec-9dab-413b67c2f0de.description: This certificate program prepares students to transition to Santa Ana College's Theatre Arts Program. Students will learn theatrical stylings, acting techniques, and technical skills that support and enhance performances. Students will be equipped with the abilities and techniques necessary to enter or upgrade within the technical and performance arenas of the entertainment industry.
c8f86b43-2ba5-48ec-9dab-413b67c2f0de.name: Introduction to Theatre Arts

alignments.name: California State Approved
alignments.description: Certificate meets the SAC Career Education standard of providing programs for students with the skills necessary to enter the workforce upon completion.

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take FIVE (5) courses: Rehearsal and Performance in Production; Technical Theatre in Production; Tour Ensemble; Motion Picture Performance Production; and Employability Skills or English for Work 2

417ef9d9-f0d3-47b0-9ed7-1ee8b30221c5.description: The Certificate of Completion in Office Leadership Skills is designed to give students the necessary knowledge and skills to support entry-level front office workers looking for a promotion. The program provides training in public speaking and beginning budgeting skills necessary for payroll services.
417ef9d9-f0d3-47b0-9ed7-1ee8b30221c5.name: Office Leadership Skills

badge_template_activities.title: Take Courses: WKPR002 Self-Advocacy, WKPR007 Social Skills and Necessary Etiquette, WKPR014 Basic Finances in the Workforce and, WKPR015 Public Communications.

c7140d2b-aeca-4f05-971b-dad17a62ac48.description: Earners acquire knowledge about the treatment of psychological and behavioral health disorders and the philosophy of delivery of mental health services to improve entry into this field. Students attain skill development in basic delivery of services, documentation, and reporting, introduction to human development, principles of case management, working with families, and employability.
c7140d2b-aeca-4f05-971b-dad17a62ac48.name: Professional Mental Health Worker

alignments.name: California Community Colleges State Chancellor's Office.

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take FOUR (4) courses: Employability Skills; Paraprofessional Mental Health Worker I, Paraprofessional Mental Health Worker II; and Paraprofessional Mental Health Worker III

28125ac4-9a0f-4810-9058-af7804a10b27.description: This certificate program prepares students to transition to Santa Ana College's Computerized Accounting-QuickBooks Certificate Program to advance their training. By obtaining this certificate, they will learn accounting theory and obtain practical knowledge of QuickBooks. Moreover, students will have the knowledge and skills necessary to obtain entry-level clerk jobs that utilize QuickBooks.
28125ac4-9a0f-4810-9058-af7804a10b27.name: QuickBooks - Tier 2

alignments.name: California State Approved
alignments.description: Certificate meets the SAC Career Education standard of providing programs for students with the skills necessary to enter the workforce upon completion.

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, Take FOUR (4) courses: Accounting Terminology; Introduction to Quickbooks; Quickbooks Tier-1: and Employability Skills or ESL: English for Work 2.

c64e55e8-5d24-42fe-92c0-5e593f5e6d71.description: Earners of the Spanish Literacy Capstone Certificate are students who will have strong reading, writing, math, science, and social studies skills up to a middle school academic level to facilitate their transition to ESL, ABE, High School Diploma, High School Equivalency, and CTE courses. Courses are taught in Spanish.
c64e55e8-5d24-42fe-92c0-5e593f5e6d71.name: Spanish Literacy Capstone

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take THREE (3) courses: Beginning Spanish Literacy; Intermediate Spanish; and Advance Spanish Literacy

dbd6df1b-a416-40ee-8652-91ded26460ac.description: Earners of the Transition College Certificate are students who successfully prepare to progress in a career path or undertake degree-applicable or non-degree applicable credit courses. In addition to preparing students for college orientation.
dbd6df1b-a416-40ee-8652-91ded26460ac.name: Transition to College

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take TWO (2) courses: Orientation to College and Choose 1 from Composition 2; Reading Proficiency Development; or Algebra 1B

a3fc48b7-54bf-47bf-9d39-39695e15335d.description: The Certificate of Completion in Transition to Higher Learning is designed to give students with intellectual, developmental, and learning disabilities the necessary knowledge and skills to be successful in their college career and future employment. Students will become familiar with college rules and guidelines as well as demonstrate an ability to address and meet their needs.
a3fc48b7-54bf-47bf-9d39-39695e15335d.name: Transition to Higher Learning

badge_template_activities.title: Take Courses: WKPR001 Transition to Higher Learning and WKPR002 Self-Advocacy.

af225fc1-caec-442d-9bc6-e4b164bda778.description: Designed for employers, the Certificate of Completion in Understanding and Supporting Employees with Disabilities provides strategies to create and maintain an inclusive, equitable, and compliant workplace successfully integrating employees with disabilities.
af225fc1-caec-442d-9bc6-e4b164bda778.name: Understanding and Supporting Employees with Disabilities

badge_template_activities.title: Take Courses: WKPR100 Understanding Employees with Disabilities in the Workplace and, WKPR101 Strategies for Working with Employees with Disabilities.

eab0acc6-415e-45b5-a640-dff606637291.description: This series of courses will provide students with the skills to move towards employment as an apprentice in various areas which may include: General and commercial contracting and/or property maintenance. In addition to getting hands-on instruction in construction, students will receive classroom instruction in math, Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) safety standards, and employability skills.
eab0acc6-415e-45b5-a640-dff606637291.name: Vocational Construction Technology

badge_template_activities.title: To obtain this certificate, take FOUR (4) courses: Career Exploration; Vocational Construction Technology Module I; Vocational Construction Technology Module II, and Employability Skills.

37f33603-ab8d-4448-bf58-990e7a2cc068.description: This program provides students with classroom discussion about creating an inclusive classroom for students with disabilities by developing an understanding of different approaches in teaching. It also provides students with in-class strategies to help all students succeed.
37f33603-ab8d-4448-bf58-990e7a2cc068.name: Working with Students with Disabilities

badge_template_activities.title: Take Courses: WKPR102 Understanding Students with Disabilities and WKPR103 Strategies for Instructing Students with Disabilities.
